A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's honestly a 3/10 movie. It's a 0/10 Star Wars movie. I don't mind the changes; I like change\, I liked The Force Awakens\, I like the new cast. I don't like the terrible writing\, I don't like the various\, unnecessary plot lines\, I don't like the butchering of certain characters\, I don't like Rian Johnson's incredibly questionable decision to turn it into a pseudo-comedy every 4 minutes. The film has absolutely no substance at all\, and falls into tiny\, undisgestible chunks upon any scrutiny whatsoever. Avoid this garbage fire like your life depends on it.
